name: Machu Picchu Exploration
description: Embark on a journey to Machu Picchu, the iconic Inca citadel, and hike the Inca Trail or take the train to witness this archaeological wonder.

name: Amazon Rainforest Adventure
description: Experience the wonders of the Amazon Rainforest in Peru. Take guided jungle expeditions, spot wildlife, and learn about the rich biodiversity.

name: Lake Titicaca Discovery
description: Explore Lake Titicaca, the world's highest navigable lake. Visit the Uros floating islands and Taquile Island to learn about the indigenous cultures.

name: Colca Canyon Trek
description: Trek through Colca Canyon, one of the world's deepest canyons, and witness the majestic Andean condor in flight.

name: Nazca Lines Flight
description: Take a flight over the enigmatic Nazca Lines, massive geoglyphs etched into the desert floor, and unravel their mysteries.

name: Cusco City and Sacsayhuamán Ruins
description: Explore the historic city of Cusco, visit ancient temples, and marvel at the massive stone ruins of Sacsayhuamán overlooking the city.

name: Inca Trail to Machu Picchu
description: Embark on the famous Inca Trail trek, a multi-day adventure through stunning landscapes, ancient ruins, and diverse ecosystems.

name: Ballestas Islands Wildlife Tour
description: Take a boat tour to the Ballestas Islands, often referred to as the 'Poor Man's Galápagos,' and observe sea lions, penguins, and seabirds.

name: Arequipa's Santa Catalina Monastery
description: Visit the Santa Catalina Monastery in Arequipa, a stunning colonial-era convent filled with vibrant colors and historical significance.

name: Trek to Rainbow Mountain (Vinicunca)
description: Embark on a challenging trek to Rainbow Mountain, famous for its colorful stripes of mineral deposits and high-altitude landscapes.
